WITH Param AS ( SELECT ID as PersonID FROM Person WHERE PersonGUID = #{id} )
SELECT 1 AS i, ParentPerson.PersonGUID as id, ParentPerson.FullNameReversed as name, ChildRelationship.Nature1 AS nature, -- note: nature 1 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ChildRelationship C WHERE C.PersonID = ParentPerson.ID) AS grandparents --Relationship.Private AS prvt_parent, --ChildRelationship.Private AS prvt_child, --ChildRelationship.Preferred AS pref FROM Param LEFT OUTER JOIN ChildRelationship ON (ChildRelationship.PersonID = Param.PersonID) LEFT OUTER JOIN Relationship ON (Relationship.ID = ChildRelationship.RelationshipID) LEFT OUTER JOIN Person AS ParentPerson ON (ParentPerson.ID = Relationship.Person1ID) -- note: parent 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 2 AS i, ParentPerson.PersonGUID as id, ParentPerson.FullNameReversed as name, ChildRelationship.Nature2 AS nature, -- note: nature 2 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ChildRelationship C WHERE C.PersonID = ParentPerson.ID) AS grandparents --Relationship.Private, --ChildRelationship.Private, --ChildRelationship.Preferred FROM Param LEFT OUTER JOIN ChildRelationship ON (ChildRelationship.PersonID = Param.PersonID) LEFT OUTER JOIN Relationship ON (Relationship.ID = ChildRelationship.RelationshipID) LEFT OUTER JOIN Person AS ParentPerson ON (ParentPerson.ID = Relationship.Person2ID) -- note: parent 2
ORDER BY i
